original_title: Історія про дівчинку, яка наступила на хліб
overview: The girl Inge was good and loved... herself very much. Inge was given bread to take to her poor parents, and she, crossing a puddle and afraid to dirty her new shoes, threw the bread in the mud and stepped on it. From such a terrible act, the earth parted and swallowed her.  Based on Hans Christian Andersen's fairy tale.
title: The Story Of The Girl Who Stepped On Bread
